rules.natural: If an employee attends the corporate event at the company retreat, then an executive attends networking at the industry mixer.
Either an employee attends the corporate event at the company retreat or an employee performs their job duty at a client meeting.
Provided that the host provides alternatives such as non-alcoholic drinks, it is not the case that the bartender serves alcohol during the cocktail hour.

Either the CEO delivers a speech for the opening remarks, or if the security guard restricting alcohol according to company policy does not imply that the bartender does not serve alcohol during the cocktail hour, then the supervisor monitors behavior concerning employee conduct.
If an employee violates the policy by drinking during work, then the employee does not consume alcohol in the form of wine.

Under the condition that the HR manager issues a warning for a first offense, if a staff member displays impairment through slurred speech, then an employee violates the policy by drinking during work.
If the HR manager documents the incident in a formal report, then the HR manager issues a warning for a first offense.
Provided that an employee performs their job duty at a client meeting, the company achieves its business goals for the quarterly targets.

Either the bartender serves alcohol during the cocktail hour, or if an employee attends the corporate event at the company retreat, then the company achieves its business goals for the quarterly targets.

Under the condition that it is not the case that an executive attending networking at the industry mixer implies the company achieves its business goals for the quarterly targets, it is not the case that a guest leaves early before dinner.

If it is not the case that the HR manager enforcing the rules as per company policy implies the HR manager documents the incident in a formal report, then the director terminates employment in a misconduct case.

Provided that it is not the case that the caterer schedules food for the buffet dinner or the event planner arranges entertainment for live music, the operations manager handles logistics for the venue setup.

Under the condition that it is not the case that the caterer schedules food for the buffet dinner or the event planner arranges entertainment for live music, it is not the case that the operations manager handles logistics for the venue setup.
